original_title: B.L.I.N.D: Born to Live In Near Darkness
overview: In this coming-of-age story about ending the stigma of the disabled being labeled as 'sinners in a past life', a blind girl, late on puberty due to malnutrition, achieves womanhood with the help of a philanthropic doctor.
title: B.L.I.N.D: Born to Live In Near Darkness
